name: Lokko
description:
PRE-ALPHA v1

  • Editing and sharing levels is easy with intuitive drag and drop logic and with a full procedural approach to generating levels and challenges, the gameplay is fresh and challenging each time.
  • Players can race each other in PvP challenges, try to beat level completion times and unlock skins, levels and NPCs with their speed racing and level building skills.
  • Players can create their own characters,costumes and NPCs from scratch in-game ,enabling them to create truly fresh levels with beautiful lighting and weather effects.
  • Time rewind and ghost replays let players hone their platforming skills in both off-line and online modes.

Lokko is planned for general release in  2019  on iOS, Android, Itch, Epic Games and Steam.

Warning** Windows release is buggy for World Creation and Avatar Editing***
WHAT IS PRE-ALPHA?

"Alpha" is the upcoming Early Access version on Steam. Not all planned features for that release are completed yet, so we're calling the current version "Pre-Alpha". The Windows version is lacking functionality in World Editor and Avatar Editor ,however players can load and play the existing levels with no problems from Play and Browse.

PRE-ALPHA FEATURES

The game has 15 in-built levels in which players can complete with obstacles ranging from spikes and moving wheels to lasers,canons and angry creatures.Players must use all their jump n run skills in order to survive,with run-times upto 2 minutes per level.

Lokko has a "time rewind" function so that players can rewind back and replay chunks of levels for grabbing those hard to find pickups.
Players are given scores based on level completion times and amount of pickups they have managed to gather during their runs.

Players can challenge other players to race with multiplayer and compete in both PvP and PvE challenges (Rankings on Leaderboards still WIP)
In addition each time a player dies, their death position is recorded so that other players can see popular "death spots" on the level and plan accordingly.

Controls are simple buttons at the bottom of the game for mobile and standard WASD + Space for Windows.
Players can correct their jumps in mid-air by using the left/right buttons

Lokko creates procedural gameplay ready platforms each time a player starts a new template.
Each procedurally created level has a mix of handcrafted obstacles and gaps ,however player can add more obstacles, NPCs and extend the ground out as per their requirements.

Players can hook up dynamic obstacles such as wheels,platforms and canon to switches which get activated on player touch.
Using a combination of static and dynamic obstacles, players can create fun challenging levels for other players and upload their creations for other players to enjoy.

Lokko has been designed from the ground up for players to challenge and compete for best speed-race.

Lokko creates procedural worlds and unique looks per world with gorgeous lighting, shadows, fog and effects Change the time of day from day to evening and night alongwith the colors of the Platformer blocks and the world.
Add water, rain and snow in order to get weather effects and give the world a unique feel

Lokko has an in-game character creator in which players can create and modify their own characters with full artistic freedom. Add pants, headphones and a hoodie onto your default characters or make him huge and hairy.
The sky's the limit as you style your avatar with your creativity.

Players can create, modify and upload their levels for other players to play on by using the in-built level editing capabilities and browse other players creations for truly challenging speed races.(Only Android version)
Players can see each as they compete with speedracing alongwith everybody being able to download replays.

 

WHAT'S NEXT

Our plans for the next few months include:

  • Level design Polish
  • NPC Customization
  • In-game trade
  • Extending existing features with new content
  • Further performance optimizations
  • Improving game balance
  • Extending modding capabilities

Of course, our players (you) are the primary source of feedback, so we'll prioritize things based on anything we hear from you.

We try to deliver new updates several times a month. You can always check all the update history in our public changelog.

Keep in mind that, while Pre-Alpha is a fully playable version, the game is not yet complete. If:

  • You want to play with content that is not in the game yet.
  • You are not ready for your saves to occasionally be wiped with updates.
  • You're not ready to play without tutorials.
  • You don't understand the concept of testing of an unfinished game.
